trans-unit.source: Are virtual machines on Azure the compute option I want?

trans-unit.source: Learn about Azure compute hosting options and how they work: App Service, Cloud Services, and Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: Learn about Azure compute hosting options and how they work: App Service, Cloud Services, and Virtual Machines

trans-unit.source: Should I Choose Azure Virtual Machines?
trans-unit.target: Should I Choose Azure Virtual Machines?

trans-unit.source: Azure provides different hosting models for running applications.
trans-unit.target: Azure provides different hosting models for running applications.

trans-unit.source: Each one provides a different set of services, so which one you choose depends on exactly what you're trying to do.
trans-unit.target: Each one provides a different set of services, so which one you choose depends on exactly what you're trying to do.

trans-unit.source: Is an Azure VM the choice for you?
